Products.name: The Infinity Blade
Products.description: The Infinity Blade is the main catalyst of the Infinity Blade trilogy. It is a weapon created by Galath, the Worker of Secrets, to undo his invention of the Deathless. When used against one, it destabilises the opponents's QIP, therefore granting him or her a . It functions the same as the other Infinity Weapons. For the game, see Infinity Blade I. For the 'classic Infinity Blade' found in Infinity Blade III, see Infinity Blade. Obtaining the Infinity Blade in the first game requires

Products.name: Poison Sword
Products.description: Poison Sword by Edison MoodyHighly toxic naturally formed crystal cut into the shape of a blade. Over years the crystal begins to eat away at the wooden hilt and metal guard. Sculpted in Zbrush and textured in Substance Painter

Products.name: ArtStation
Products.description: ArtStation is the leading showcase platform for games, film, media & entertainment artists.

Products.name: Kusari Gama
Products.description: A kusari-gama or scythe (鎖鎌) is an ancient Japanese martial art weapon developed from a farm implement, one end of which is a scythe for mowing grass connected to the other end by a mace by a chain. Iron. In Japanese, 'kusari' means chain, and 'kama' or 'gama' (suffix) means scythe.

An ax is an item that has been used for thousands of years, used to cut trees for wood or as a weapon. Axes come in many styles, but mainly consist of blades attached to the handle. The first axes were made from stone, later made of bronze, bronze, iron, and steel

Products.name: United Cutlery Gil Hibben's Karambit
Products.description: Looking for the United Cutlery Gil Hibben's Karambit? The 9 1/4 karambit is constructed of 5Cr15MoV 5 3/8stainless steel blade and has a handle that features black linen Micarta scales and nickel pins. A premium black leather sheath with the Hibben Knives logo completes the package.

Products.name: shuriken
Products.description: A Shuriken (Japanese 手裏剣; Sword of the Dead) is a Japanese hidden weapon used as a secret weapon or as a tool to distract enemies. Contrary to misconceptions, the fact that shuriken is not poisoned

armor.name: Áo giáp cánh tay
armor.description: Áo giáp cánh tay là một loại áo giáp chiến đấu có cánh tay rộng, phù hợp cho các hoạt động tập luyện vũ khí và phòng thủ.

armor.name: Áo giáp ngực

armor.name: Áo giáp cánh tay và ngực

armor.name: Áo giáp đầu và cổ
